> 
> Lastly, Mr. and Mrs. Fujita, their kids are all grown and left the nest
> enjoy taking strolls together (well Tokio enjoys the walks)
> Mr. Fujita "Look Tokio, according to the future authoritative texts
> Meiji era husbands and wives are rarely seen in public together except
> during family gatherings or holidays"
> Mrs. Fujita (grabs his hand)  "Oh, nonsense let's take jinrikshaw and
> go shopping---::assumes menacing tone:: otherwise I'll have to cut
> your cigarette allowance"
